org.teamfarce.mirch

Class MIRCH

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationAdapter
      • org.teamfarce.mirch.MIRCH
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener

    public class MIRCH
extends com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationAdapter
    MIRCH is used to generate all graphics in the program. It initialises the scenario generator and game state and provides all interactions with the back end of the program.
    Author:
    jacobwunwin

    • Method Detail

      • drawCharacterSelection

        public int[] drawCharacterSelection()
        Controls the initial character traits selection at the start of the game.

        Selection is made through a series of pop up windows.

        Returns:
        An array of integers containing the trait selections.

      • render

        public void render()
        The render function deals with all game logic. It recieves inputs from the input controller, carries out logic and pushes outputs to the screen through the display controller
        Specified by:
        render in interface com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener
